directions: Whisk oil, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Stir in parsley and capers.
Add celery root and celery to dressing; toss to coat. Let sit 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 medium celery root (celeriac), peeled, thinly sliced on a mandoline
5 celery stalks, thinly sliced into long ribbons on a mandoline
title: Celery on Celery Salad
